summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackDermalogica's Phyto Nature Lifting Eye Cream is a transformative eye cream with potent peptides and phytoactives to deliver a more lifted look. See measurable lifted eyes after 1 use*.
details: DetailsBenefitsVisibly lifts and firms and reduces eyelid foldsSmooths and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinklesHydrates and visibly re-densifies skinKey IngredientsQuinoa Seed Extract: helps to visibly reduce eyelid folds and refine skin's textureAdaptogenic Astragalus, Electric Daisy Flower and CoQ10: smooth and tighten for a lifted lookPowerful Peptides: visibly firm, boosts skin's resilience, and defend against free radicalsMoisturizing Blend with Cassava Extract: smooths to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinklesMatcha Butter, Squalane, Vitamin E, and Pro-Vitamin B5: hydrate & sootheResearch Results1 use to measurably lifted eyes*clinical proof: 1 use to measurably lifted eyes*Obtained during independent clinical testing of 31 people, 2 applications/day for 8 weeksExpert Assessment:97% showed lifting in upper eyelids*94% showed a visible reduction in wrinkles**97% showed more even skin tone**97% showed brighter skin**Results after 8 weeks** Results after 4 weeks*Obtained during independent clinical testing of 31 people, 2 applications/day for 8 weeksItem 2624462How To UseWarm a pea-sized amount between fingers. Gently pat onto undereye area and eyelids, massaging in upward motion from the orbital bone toward your temples. Use twice daily.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Panthenol, Squalane, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Hydrogenated Ethylhexyl Olivate, Propanediol, Triethylhexanoin, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Cetearyl Alcohol, Bis-Ethoxydiglycol Cyclohexane 1,4-Dicarboxylate, PEG-100 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ubiquinone, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Salvia Sclarea (Clary) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Viola Odorata Leaf Extract, Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Tapioca Starch, Chenopodium Quinoa Seed Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Powder, Sphingomonas Ferment Extract, Spilanthes Acmella Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Astragalus Membranaceus Root Extract, Hordeum Vulgare Seed Extract, Candida Bombicola/Glucose/Methyl Rapeseedate Ferment, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Lavandula Spica (Lavender) Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Litsea Cubeba Fruit Oil, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Unsaponifiables, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Tocopherol, Carnosine, Allantoin, Caprylyl Glycol, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-9, Beta-Glucan, Caffeine, Mannitol, Bisabolol, Trehalose, Lactobacillus Ferment, 1,2-Hexanediol, Steareth-21, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Sodium Hydroxide, Aminomethyl Propanol, Carbomer, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Limonene, Linalool, Citral.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Warm a pea-sized amount between fingers. Gently pat onto undereye area and eyelids, massaging in upward motion from the orbital bone toward your temples. Use twice daily.

reviews.headline: Unsure
reviews.comments: Creamy texture, not too heavy, unscented. Seems to absorb nicely. Unable to see real results in only 3ish weeks. However, the top has come off without being dropped.

reviews.headline: Worth the price!
reviews.comments: This eye cream is truly amazing! It's very hydrating and absolutely works! A little bit goes a long way, there is no heavy smell. I have used many, many expensive eye creams for my hooded eyes. Be patient and use daily,  it truly works with continued use.  I am in my early 50s, so happy that I purchased this eye cream and will absolutely purchase it again!

reviews.headline: I would not pay this again
reviews.comments: It's not working

reviews.headline: Doesn't work
reviews.comments: Normally im a big fan of Dermalogica and ive loved all the products ive tried. But this completely missed the mark. It did nothing for undereye circles, slight wrinkles, dryness‚Ä¶probably one of the worst eye creams ive used. Save your money and buy something different. It seems like all the good reviews here were just left because people got the product for free.

reviews.headline: Impressive
reviews.comments: I have been using this eye cream for 11 months now. Still on my first bottle. A little goes a long way. great product! Under eye puffiness gone, fine lines gone and eye lids less droopy.

reviews.headline: Absolutely amazing
reviews.comments: I normally wait until I've used a product a week or so before writing but after one use I'm beyond impressed by the results. The deep wrinkles around my eyes are so much more subtle. I was previously using Clarins and switched to this recently and am so glad I decided to try something new.

reviews.headline: Drying
reviews.comments: I've tried it twice. It looks like its working in the moment but it actually dried my skin out. Its not moisturizing at all. Sure, it lifts abd brightebs but theres no long term effrct. Continued use of this product would do more harm than good. Good thing I just had a sample to try.

reviews.headline: itchy and irritated eyes!!!
reviews.comments: This eye cream made my eyes itch and irritated all day.  I wear contact lenses and this was very uncomfortable. Avoid if you have sensitive eyes and wear contact lenses.

reviews.headline: Can't compare to discontinued Total Eye Care
reviews.comments: Dermalogica Total Eye Care was excellent, this is not. It has a very heavy silicone feel, annoyingly irritable to eyes if it sits in close proximity to lash line, no benefit to skin, doesn't play nicely with concealer, no light reflecting properties

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: I'm 65 and have eyelid bags and wrinkles. I tried this product for the first time and saw a difference. Everyday I have lifted eyes now and no puffiness. I really can't believe this works so well. So happy I tried it. Skin care is trial and error. This time it was a perfect choice!

reviews.headline: Works well but.....
reviews.comments: This product actually works really well. I was starting to see serious improvement in my hooded lids within a little over a week. However, I began developing massive allergy symptoms. I'm not allowing it to affect my rating though, because that's a "me" issue, not their fault. I have super sensitive skin, and it didn't burn or anything, I just started noticing itchy, watery eyes and sneezing (not sick). After I washed it off this morning, I felt almost immediate relief. Really sad about it, because it took me weeks to convince myself to spend the money.

reviews.headline: Love It
reviews.comments: Love the product however the is too much waste in a pump

reviews.headline: Made things worse
reviews.comments: This product is supposed to show improvement immediately. I actually feel like it made my eyes more swollen on the very first use and every time after. I love dermalogica products but I'm pretty annoyed I fell for this obscenely priced snake oil.

reviews.headline: Non irritating
reviews.comments: I got a sample of this in a gift bag so I decided to try it, i only use all dermalogica products but not a fan of the phyto  serum. It was very smoothing, eyes felt hydrated and plumped. So far i like this eye cream better than the other ones

reviews.headline: WOW!! Really works!! I LOVE THIS PRODUCT
reviews.comments: I'm  going to be honest here. I didn't think it was working after 1 month. I was using it day & night. However when I went back to look at my old pictures, WOW IT DID WORK!! I am sorry but I can't figure out how to leave my pictures to show you the before & after Everyone is SHOCKED at my pictures!!. So now I'm convinced, I bought more plus 3 more of their products to try. I swear it is a miracle! üòÅ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

reviews.headline: I'm actually surprised!!
reviews.comments: I received a sample of this eye cream and used it for about five days and actually seen a difference! I have hereditary dark cirlces that are dark and baggy. I actually noticed a tightening and brightening difference under my eyes which is so exciting to see just in a few days. I feel like my eye area looks more lifted and my face looks more awake and rested. Im going to break open my sample bottle and scrape every last bit then buy the full size since its pretty pricey but honestly worth it!

reviews.headline: Dermalogica missed the mark here
reviews.comments: I love the phyto nature oxygen cream so when this eye cream was launched, I had to try it. I found the eye cream to be drying and not moisterizing. I use Dermalogica products almost exclusively but this one isn't on par with their quality. You would be better off using the phyto moisturizer under your eyes. This will be returned.

reviews.headline: Not worth the money
reviews.comments: I paid for mine the rest of the 5 ‚≠ê review's who got this for FREE. No HONEST review's for a few weeks, I found this not to be anything but basic eye cream. I purchased mine and returned it, don't buy this!!!

reviews.headline: Not worth the money
reviews.comments: I paid for mine the rest of the 5 ‚≠ê review's who got this for FREE. No HONEST review's for a few weeks, I found this not to be anything but basic eye cream. I purchased mine and returned it, don't buy this!!!

reviews.headline: nice
reviews.comments: I received this complimentary from dermalogica.  I recently started using this. It has a thick texture, and it hydrates well. I do feel like it helped reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. I can't wait to see the results.

Works absolutely amazing for a puffy eyes

faceoff_positive.comments: As a woman in my 30s, I'm always on the lookout for skincare products that deliver real results, especially for the delicate eye area. After using Dermalogica's Phyto-Nature Eye Cream extensively for a few weeks, I'm thrilled to share my experience. gifted by Dermalogica, from the first application, I noticed the cream's lightweight yet hydrating texture, which absorbs beautifully without leaving any greasy residue. It instantly gave my under-eye area a fresh, well-rested appearance. Over the past few weeks, I've seen some truly encouraging results. My fine lines have visibly softened, and the overall texture of my skin feels smoother and more supple. What impresses me the most is how this eye cream has brightened my under-eye area, reducing the appearance of dark circles that have been a constant concern for me. The natural ingredients in the formula seem to work wonders, providing a refreshing and rejuvenating effect that lasts throughout the day. Overall, Dermalogica's Phyto-Nature Eye Cream has become a staple in my skincare routine. It's effective, gentle, and delivers on its promises. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for an eye cream that genuinely works, especially if you're in your 30s and want to maintain a youthful, vibrant look.
faceoff_positive.headline: Remarkable Results with Dermalogica's Phyto-Nature Eye Cream

faceoff_negative.comments:
First and foremost, I'll start by saying I have mixed feelings on this. Being in my forties, an eye cream is imperative. I need something that's going to hydrate, plump, brighten, and address signs of aging.  With that being said, I also need something that is affordable that I can replace when the time comes without breaking the bank. Unfortunately, although this one does work decent, it is not something that I would be able replace as needed- so it's a good thing  only a tiny bit is needed and this bottle will last for a little while. So, how does it work? It actually seems to work fairly well. It has a medium to thicker consistency that absorbs nicely into my under eye area. It is slightly sticky at first but that does dissipate, leaving my under eye looking and feeling hydrated, plumped, and smoothed now that I've been using it both a.m. and p.m. for a few weeks now. As far as the lifting effect, yes I think it does.. temporarily. I don't think it's a permanent solution by any means, so as long as I can continue to afford this eye cream, I'm good. This wears very nicely under my makeup. There's no pilling, no separating, just a nice hydrated base for my concealer to lie on. Now onto the ingredients. Considering this is vegan, it is made with a lot of different natural oils and extracts, one of which being peppermint. If you have sensitive skin or eye area, proceed with caution. I personally have have no adverse reactions, but I feel like it's worth noting.

Overall, I do really enjoy this, but sadly it will not be able to repurchase once this is gone. Two stars removed for price point. Complimentary from Dermalogica
faceoff_negative.headline: Nice but pricey
